/*@author ukumar*/
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define si(a) scanf("%d", &a)
#define sl(a) scanf("%lld", &a)
#define sc(a) scanf("%c", &a)
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define SET(x, a) memset(x, a, sizeof(x))

using namespace std;
ll tree[400000] = {0};
ll a[100005];

ll construct(ll l, ll r, ll node)
{
	if (l > r) {
		return 0;
	}
	if (l == r) {
		tree[node] = a[l];
		return tree[node];
	} else {
		int mid = (l + r) / 2;
		tree[node] = construct(l, mid, 2 * node) + construct(mid + 1, r, 2 * node + 1);
		return tree[node];
	}
}

ll query(ll l, ll r, ll node, ll x, ll y)
{
	if (l > r) {
		return 0;
	}
	ll m = (l + r) / 2;
	if (y < l || x > r) {
		return 0;
	}
	if (l >= x && r <= y) {
		return tree[node];
	}

	return query(l, m, 2 * node, x, y) + query(m + 1, r, 2 * node + 1, x, y);
}

int main()
{
	int t;
	si(t);
	ll n;ll q;
	while (t--) {
		sl(n);sl(q);
		for (ll i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
			sl(a[i]);
		}
		ll x, y;
		x = construct(1, n, 1);
		while (q--) {
			sl(x);sl(y);
			printf("%lld\n", query(1, n, 1, x, y));
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
